https://tmrev.io/movie/954015-April Aroused 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/rtQ90E1woWhCgQGbddPeWKYbZ7Q.jpg April is interning at a museum that has received a rare artifact from Africa. Mr. Jenkins, the museum curator, explains that the artifact has a mysterious titillating energy that awakens the inner sexual being of anyone who is looking at it. One evening, April, Mr. Jenkins, and a few other colleagues are all seduced by the sculpture's seductive lair. Mesmerized and unable to resist, April and her friends begin provocatively researching each other. April Aroused
